about:
I am a passionate developer with a focus on building intelligent systems. 
My journey in tech has been driven by a fascination with pattern recognition, computer vision, and machine learning.
I thrive on solving complex problems and creating software that makes a difference. 
Currently exploring advancements in neural networks and supply chain analytics. I also like dogs.

projects.Title: Artificial System Software [AiSS]
projects.Description: A neural network-based system designed for advanced pattern recognition tasks.

projects.Title: Apple Suppliers System [AppleSS]
projects.Description: A supply chain analytics dashboard to visualize and manage supplier data.

projects.Title: VisionKit [VK]
projects.Description: An open-source toolkit for common image processing operations.

projects.Title: Portfolio Terminal
projects.Description: The very terminal you are using right now!

experience.Description: Developed and evaluated models for image classification, achieving a 15% improvement in accuracy over baseline.
Built and maintained responsive websites and e-commerce solutions for various clients. Specialized in React and Node.js.
Worked on a large-scale data processing pipeline using Apache Spark and Kafka.

skills.Programming Languages: Python, C++, JavaScript, Java, Kotlin, Go
skills.Web Development: Node.js, Express, React, Next.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, GraphQL
skills.Cloud & DevOps: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, CI/CD, Terraform
skills.Soft Skills: Problem Solving, Communication, Team Collaboration, Project Management, Agile Methodologies

education.Degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
education.Notable Coursework: Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning

education.Degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.Notable Coursework: Neural Networks, Image Processing, Engineering Economics, Advanced Algorithms

activities.Description: Led a team to build a prize-winning project in the AI for Good category.
Contributed performance optimizations to the data loading module.
Presented a talk on 'Scaling PyTorch Models for Production'.
